InstructionData.Title: Air Mixer v2
InstructionData.Description: Air mixer that uses less powerâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Breathable Air Mixer # https://github.com/dtandersen/sta # Note: Input1 = Nitrogen # Input 2= Oxygen alias N2Sensor d0 alias AirSensor d1 alias GasMixer d2 alias Unused d3 alias Unused d4 alias Unused d5
alias n2pressure r3 alias outpressure r4 alias active r5 alias temp1 r10
define maxPressure 1000 define SLEEPTIME 30
init: s N2Sensor On 1 s AirSensor On 1
start: l outpressure AirSensor Pressure slt active outpressure maxPressure beqz active inactive s GasMixer On 1 s N2Sensor On 1 l n2pressure N2Sensor Pressure select temp1 n2pressure 80 0 s GasMixer Setting temp1 j done
inactive: s GasMixer On 0 s N2Sensor On 0 s AirSensor On 0 sleep SLEEPTIME s AirSensor On 1
done: yield j start
